meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barbara Lieberman Jim Hennessy Deborah Hummel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1273.

td.p: Barbara Lieberman, a librarian from Pinebrook, New Jersey
Jim Hennessy, a writer & consultant from San Clemente, California
Deborah Hummel, a proofreader from York, Pennsylvania

tr.td: EARLY AMERICA
THE COMICS
"H" ON THE MAP
PERFUME
WORDS
THE SPORT PLAYED
(Alex: We'll give you the names of individuals, you have to identify the sport.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1790 the 1st of these was issued; it went to Samuel Hopkins of Vermont for a new method of making potash')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1790 the 1st of these was issued; it went to Samuel Hopkins of Vermont for a new method of making potash

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Deborah, you\'ll recall we said 3 of the 5; your opponents came up with 3 of the 5.)
(Deborah: Lah-de-dah!)
(Alex: You came up with the other two... you\'re going to be the new Jeopardy! champion by $2. Venezuela and Kuwait were right!)
BarbaraWhat is Iran, Saudi Arabia & Iraq?
$1,400
JimWhat is Saudi Arabia, Iran & Iraq?
$5,698
DeborahWhat is Saudi Arabia, Venezuela & Kuwait?
$5,100
(3 of) Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia & Venezuela')
